QuestData.Title: Tending to the Tenders
QuestData.Description: The eggs are a problem, but so are the gorm that take care of them.$b$bThe egg-tenders are the leaders of the hive when no matriarch is present. If left unchecked, they will simply produce more eggs and we will be right back where we started. Or worse, one of them could turn into a queen. $b$BThey are simply too large and hostile for us to properly contain. I see no other recourse than to put them down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Egg-Tenders Tiom, Bloome and Erys.
QuestData.RewardText: The population will produce more tenders eventually. You have bought us valuable time.
